job_history.work_description: Provide administrative support to the Human Resources Director. Verify I-9 documentation for new hires. Submit the online investigation requests and assists with new employee background checks. Update HR spreadsheet with employee change requests and process paperwork.
Managed fashion retail store independently. Provided professional support to staff. Assisted retail store in exhibiting innovative products.

Responsible for the assembly of fabricated phase boxes, portfolios and custom enclosures for protecting historic and fragile library materials. Performed archival sound repairs for books and pamphlets which included: rebinding books in the original covers (recasing). Prepared and submitted books for additional processing at the bindery. Designed complex enclosures for special projects.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed fashion retail store independently and provided professional support to staff, showing a solid working proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Designed complex enclosures for special projects as a Preservation Technician I, indicating some practical experience in project management.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Handled multiple responsibilities as an HR Assistant Intern and Preservation Technician I, showing a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Provided administrative support to the Human Resources Director and assisted with new employee background checks, indicating a solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Performed archival sound repairs for books and pamphlets, showing some practical experience in problem-solving.

skills.name: Organizational Skills
skills.explanation: Updated HR spreadsheet with employee change requests and processed paperwork, indicating a solid working proficiency in organizational skills.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Assisted retail store in exhibiting innovative products, showing some practical experience in teamwork.

skills.name: Attention to Detail
skills.explanation: Verified I-9 documentation for new hires and prepared books for additional processing at the bindery, indicating a solid working proficiency in attention to detail.
